name: King of Parlor 2
overview: King of Parlor 2 is the second game in the recreation room simulation series. The game let the player choose in which city he wants to play, there are 3 cities avaliables: Tokyo, Nagoya & Osaka. The goal of the game is to be the biggest parlor business man in the city, to do that the player have to buy different parlor buildings and hire different employees to work in those buildings. Depending of the place he will earn more or less money.
